page.title: 16Chipping Sodbury Quarry.
page.content: Chipping Sodbury Quarry has made a big difference to the landscape in the western part of our square.It occupies a total area of about 2 square kilometers.The present quarry owners are the Amey Roadstone company (ARC) and the rock quarried is limestone which is used for road building and is also made into concrete pipes.Blasting at the Quarry can be expected to take place 3 times a day.The blasting noise can be clearly heard up to two miles and there are some environmental problems caused by the dust from the quarry and the heaps of stones and rock which can be seen from a distance. The quarry also generates a lot of heavy traffic with lorries making frequent journeys to and from the quarry.The quarry is one of the major employers of the Yate area.
